About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, I'm Robin Vanvoorden, a 22 year old designer from Belgium. I'm currently finishing my master in graphic design at PXL-MAD, specialising in interactive design. I love busting my brain over concepts and seeing everything come together into something real. I also like boardgames.

Interactive Design

Fun

As a designer I see my role as the person in charge of how projects look and feel. In other words, it's my job to make things feel fun, cool, serious or sophisticated.

Motion Design

Digital playground

I love playing around with new technology and am always interested in learning new things. Whether it's designing apps and websites or learning about coding or virtual reality.

PXL MAD

Master in Graphic Design

Currently I'm working on my mastersproject, which involves spacetravel. I base myself on the current events involving SpaceX and Virgin Galactics and use this to find out what this could mean for the future of design in this field.
